name: The Attic's a Dungeon ?!
description:
twitter | facebook | website | press contact | more games

Beware adventurers, by entering the attic, you may expose yourself to dangerous monsters. You may have thought that finding the hidden treasure of captain Lee would be an easy task. Well, let's see how you will manage to survive theses monsters while solving the captain's riddles.


El BigoteHe may look dumb, but his first hit sure hurts

Mr WalrusDon't be surprised  by his quick move
TeniaThis one is really strong, did I mention his draining ability ?
Mr AvocadoHis long distance attack is gonna make you crazy
HandyHandy doesn't like to lose, and he has a quick rotation skill

Mr IncredibleDon't make him quit his beloved spot, or he will make you regret it

Mr TongueMr Tongue is very talented, you have to experience his multi target move
RollmopsYes, it is a surprising way to move, but it's also super efficient
PsychorneliusThis one has psychic powers, as you may guess
CycloporWatch your step, or this little one will surprise you from behind

The Attic's a Dungeon was released as an entry for the ROPE gamejam (Ressurect an Old Project Etc). With the participation of Pierre Bernon, Julie Chane-Hive, Sofiane Djabou and Colin Thil.
